BASE_FEE_MAX_CHANGE_DENOMINATOR().notice: Denominator that determines max change on fee per block.

ELASTICITY_MULTIPLIER().notice: Along with the resource limit, determines the target resource limit.

MAXIMUM_BASE_FEE().notice: Maximum base fee value, cannot go higher than this.

MINIMUM_BASE_FEE().notice: Minimum base fee value, cannot go lower than this.

TARGET_RESOURCE_LIMIT().notice: Target amount of the resource that should be used within this block.

userdoc.notice: ResourceMetering implements an EIP-1559 style resource metering system where pricing         updates automatically based on current demand.

documentation.text: @notice Maximum amount of the resource that can be used within this block.
@notice Along with the resource limit, determines the target resource limit.
@notice Target amount of the resource that should be used within this block.
@notice Denominator that determines max change on fee per block.
@notice Minimum base fee value, cannot go lower than this.
@notice Maximum base fee value, cannot go higher than this.
@notice Reserve extra slots (to a total of 50) in the storage layout for future upgrades.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ResourceMetering: cannot buy more gas than available gas limit"

arguments.value: ResourceMetering: cannot buy more gas than available gas limit

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ResourceMetering: cannot buy more gas than available gas limit"

documentation.text:
@notice Meters access to a function based an amount of a requested resource.
 @param _amount Amount of the resource requested.

@notice Sets initial resource parameter values. This function must either be called by the
         initializer function of an upgradeable child contract.
